title.rendered: Sharp Airlines in Hamilton, Victoria, Australia

content.rendered:
Sharp Airlines is a regional airline headquartered in Hamilton, Victoria, Australia and operating in the southern states of Australia. It was founded on 1990. Its main bases are Portland Airport, Adelaide Airport and Launceston Airport. The airline also provides charter operations to regional Victoria and South Australia. The parent company Sharp Aviation has a flight training operation base at Hamilton Airport, and a maintenance base at Portland Airport.

Sharp Airlines in Victoria, Australia Contact Address, Phone, Email, Fax, Working hours and Website

Address: Sharp Airlines Head Office
44 Gray Street
PO Box 710
Hamilton VIC 3300

Phone number: +61 (0) 3 55748216

Fax: +61 (0) 3 5574 8258

Email: cargoyul@expaircargo.com

Reservations & General Enquiries

1300 55 66 94

Email: reservations@sharpairlines.com.au

International Calls: +61 3 5574 8216

Urgent after-hours messages: +61 (0) 438 553 263

Business hours: Monday to Friday: 8am to 6pm
Saturday: Closed
Sunday: Closed

Launceston

Phone number: +61 3 6391 8954
Email: launceston@sharpairlines.com.au

Flinders Island

Phone number: +61 3 6359 2312 or +61 3 6359 2139
Email: flindersisland@sharpairlines.com.au

King Island

Phone number: +61 4 27 611 133 or +61 3 6462 1510
Email: kingislandbase@sharpairlines.com.au

Essendon

Phone number: +61 3 9374 3987
Email: essendon@sharpairlines.com.au

Charter Services

For charter enquiries complete the Charter Enquiry Form

Phone number: +61 (0) 3 55748216 or +61 (0) 422 366 151

In-Flight Magazine Enquiries

Phone number: 0438 778 161
Email: heidi@organisedsuccess.com

Sharp Airlines Official Website: https://www.sharpairlines.com.au/

Sharp Airlines Online Check-in: https://sharpairlines.com/travel-information/getting-there-on-time/

Note: Online Check-in opens from 60 mins and closes 30 mins before scheduled flight departure time.

Check Sharp Airlines schedule here: https://www.sharpairlines.com.au/index.php/bookings/flights/

Check Sharp Airlines flight status here: https://www.sharpairlines.com.au/index.php/bookings/flights/

Sharp Airlines Baggage Allowance

View Sharp Airlines Hand | Cabin baggage, Checked baggage, Excess baggage charges, over weight baggage charges, over size baggage charges in the above link.

Types of Planes / Air craft available with Sharp Airlines

Total fleet: 15

  • Cessna 441
  • Fairchild SA227-AC Metro III
  • Fairchild SA227-DC Metro 23

Queries handled by Sharp Airlines Customer care:

Schedule, eBooking, Rescheduling, Track and Trace, Charter Service Queries, Trucking service Queries, e-claims Flight Information, Missing Luggage, Delayed Flights. Pharma, pets, valuable, perishable goods and extra care shipment queries.

Is there any problem / complaint with reaching the Sharp Airlines in Victoria, Australia Address or Phone number? Please report any issues using the below comment form.

Rate your experience with the Sharp Airlines in Victoria, Australia: (click on the stars below)
